CustomField.formula: if( Annual_Revenue_as_Reported__c>= 1000000000 , TEXT(CurrencyIsoCode) + ' ' + TEXT( Annual_Revenue_as_Reported__c/1000000000)+ ' ' + 'B' ,if( Annual_Revenue_as_Reported__c>= 1000000 , TEXT(CurrencyIsoCode)+ ' ' + TEXT( Annual_Revenue_as_Reported__c/1000000) + ' ' + 'M' ,TEXT(CurrencyIsoCode)+ ' ' + TEXT( Annual_Revenue_as_Reported__c)))
CustomField.label: Annual Revenue
